level.heading: DCPS CONTESTED RESIDENCY CASES – FINAL ORDERS (ยง 1-2908)

level.text: The presiding Administrative Law Judge shall issue a final order in all contested residency cases, which shall include the statement of appeal rights required by Subsection 2830.1.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 11122 (December 23, 2011)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 59 DCR 3128, 3131 (April 20, 2012).
